titleStmt.title: Infant baptism, and the first query thereupon whether all parents how notorious soever for their deboysery, are priveleged upon account of their own baptism, to present their infants thereunt[o] : the negative is here maintained.
titleStmt.author: Woodward, Ezekias, 1590-1675.

notesStmt.note: Attributed to Woodward by Wing and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
Reproduction of original in the Union Theological Seminary Library
